meanings.definition: The charge for transporting goods by freight.
meanings.sent1: The freightage for shipping the goods was reasonable.
meanings.sent2: The company calculated the freightage based on the weight of the cargo.
meanings.sent3: Paying the freightage felt like unlocking a special delivery.
meanings.sent4: The freightage acted as a toll for the journey of the goods.
meanings.sent5: The freightage was like a ticket for the merchandise to travel.

meanings.definition: The process of transporting goods by freight.
meanings.sent1: The freightage involved loading the goods onto the truck.
meanings.sent2: Freightage requires careful planning to ensure timely delivery.
meanings.sent3: Watching the freightage process was like observing a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent4: The efficiency of the freightage amazed the onlookers.
meanings.sent5: The smooth operation of the freightage impressed everyone involved.

meanings.definition: The goods or cargo transported by freight.
meanings.sent1: The freightage arrived at the warehouse earlier than expected.
meanings.sent2: Inspecting the freightage revealed no damage to the cargo.
meanings.sent3: The freightage seemed to whisper stories of its journey.
meanings.sent4: The freightage carried the hopes and dreams of the recipients.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the freightage brought relief to the recipients.
